books.title: Introduction to Machine Learning

books.description: A clear introduction to the key concepts and techniques in machine learning.

books.author: Foster Provost and Tom Fawcett
books.description: A practical guide to understanding data science and its applications in business contexts.

books.author: Andrew Hunt and David Thomas
books.description: A guide to becoming a better programmer by following pragmatic principles and practices.

books.title: Deep Learning
books.author: Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville
books.description: An in-depth introduction to deep learning concepts, techniques, and applications.

books.title: Artificial Intelligence: A Guide to Intelligent Systems
books.author: Michael Negnevitsky
books.description: A comprehensive introduction to the concepts and techniques of artificial intelligence.

books.title: Python for Data Analysis

books.title: Introduction to the Theory of Computation
